summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of TNTX (Tamilnadu Textile Exchange) landing page. All specified requirements verified and working correctly including TNTX branding, 9-day program stats, countdown timer, navigation, redirects, testimonials, FAQ accordion, and mobile responsiveness.

design_issues.note: Expected for demo - Apply buttons correctly redirect to Zoho Forms placeholder URL

passed_tests: Hero section displays TNTX branding (not full name) correctly
Stats display: 15 people, 9 days, Coimbatore location (no pricing shown)
Countdown timer shows 'Cohort Starts June 7th' with live countdown
Applications close notice shows 'March 31st, 2025'
Navigation contains About, Contact, Apply Now links with TNTX branding
About page loads with 'THIS IS NOT A TEXTILE TOUR' heading
About page contains all required content sections
Contact page redirects and shows info@tntx.org email
Apply buttons redirect to Zoho Forms URL (placeholder working)
Testimonials section displays 3 testimonial cards
FAQ section with accordion functionality (5+ items, clickable)
Academic section mentions 'Professors can be sponsored to audit the course'
Final CTA section with proper positioning text and Apply button
Footer displays TNTX branding and links
All Apply buttons (hero, nav, final CTA) are clickable
Mobile responsiveness (390x844 viewport) working correctly
Tablet responsiveness (768x1024 viewport) working correctly
Dark industrial aesthetic with orange accents applied throughout
Framer Motion animations working properly
All required data-testid attributes present for testing
action_item_for_main_agent: Replace placeholder Zoho Forms URL with actual form URL when ready for production. All functionality is working correctly.
